title: EP updates on banking structure reforms
text:

ing structural reforms to improve the resilience of EU credit institutions. The amendment indicates that EP would consider the proposed regulation in its plenary session on 26 to 29 October 2015. EP had previously indicated it would do so in early September. (Source: EP Updates Plenary Date for Banking Structure Reform Hearing )
